original_text: But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him that was born after the Spirit, even so it is now.
korean_text: 그러나 그 때에 육체를 따라 난 자가 성령을 따라 난 자를 박해한 것 같이 이제도 그러하도다

sentences.original_text: But as then he that was born after the flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그때 육체를 따라 난 그가

sentences.original_text: persecuted him that was born after the Spirit
